title: End-to-End Testing
subject: Angular
theory: E2E testing simulates a real user interacting with the app in a browser. While Protractor was built-in, the community has moved to Cypress or Playwright. These tests run against a running application.

interview_questions.question: Why is Protractor being deprecated?
interview_questions.answer: Modern tools like Cypress offer better stability, debugging, and speed compared to Protractor's Selenium WebDriver approach.

real_world_use_cases.description: Script visits login, types credentials, clicks submit, and verifies dashboard URL.

summary: E2E tests provide the highest level of confidence that the system works as a whole.
